attributes.action: Stop the sale of fireworks to the public.
attributes.additional_details:
http://www.mirror.co.uk/news/uk-news/dad-dies-after-lit-firework-11482176  

this is a link from the mirror newspaper of the man who died in his home because of fireworks.
attributes.background: Ban the sale of fireworks to the public just this week alone in my area 2 different families have had fireworks stuck through the letterbox.  Fireworks are a weapon in the wrong hands and have not only been used to torment and hurt people but animals too.
